This vignette demonstrates benchmark comparisons of `dbSpatial` vs `terra`. The test data consists of points representing gene locations and polygons representing biological cell nuclei. The polygons were generated using QuPath's segmentation. The nuclei images and gene location can be downloaded [here](https://db.cngb.org/stomics/mosta/download/).

## Load deps
```{r setup}
library(dbSpatial)
library(terra)
```
